ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
    const {java} = this
    $ = JSON.parse(url).data
    if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
        arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
    } else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
        arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
    } else {
        java.toast("è·å– book_id å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½ å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦ç™»å½•ï¼")
    }
    return arr
}

let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['æ‰‹åŠ¨ç™»å½•Token'])

getShelf = () => {
    let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
    let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
        headers: {
            'Cookie': ck
        }
    }))

    bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
    let id_list = splitArray(bid, 200)
    let urls = []
    id_list.forEach(i => {
        urls.push(getApi() + "fq_details/?book_id=" + i.join(","))
    })

    res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

    let resp = {book_info: []}
    res.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
    })

    return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
    let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

    let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
        headers: {
            'Cookie': ck,
        }
    })))
    let group_bookids = {
        "æœªåˆ†ç»„": []
    }
    book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
        if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
        group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "æœªåˆ†ç»„"].push(i.book_id)
    })
    
    if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
    
    let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
    let urls = []

    book_ids.forEach(i => {
        urls.push(getApi() + "fq_details/?book_id=" + i.join(","))
    })
    
    res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

    let resp = {book_info: []}
    res.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
    })

    return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
    let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
        "bookmall/tab",
        "version_name=5.8.9.32",
        null,
        ck
    )
    let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
    let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
    if (!tab) tab = []
    let bookList = []
    for (let i of tab) {
        bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    }
    return { book_info: bookList }
}

function normalizeResponse(data) {
    if (data.book_info) return data.book_info;
    if (data.data && data.data.book_info) return data.data.book_info;
    if (data.data && Array.isArray(data.data)) return data.data;
    if (data.list) return data.list;
    if (data.book_list) return data.book_list;
    if (data.data && data.data.publication_list) return data.data.publication_list;
    if (data.result) return data.result;
    if (data.data && data.data.result) return data.data.result;
    if (data.data && data.data.cell_view && data.data.cell_view.book_data) {
        return data.data.cell_view.book_data;
    }
    return [];
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) {
    result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
} else if(/read_history/.test(baseUrl)) {
    bid = getBookIdFull(result);
    id_list = splitArray(bid, 200);
    let urls = [];
    id_list.forEach(i => {
        urls.push(getApi() + "fq_details/?book_id=" + i.join(","))
    });
    let resp = {book_info: []}
    urls.forEach(r => {
        resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(java.ajax(r)).data)
    })
    result = resp;
} else {
    let w = baseUrl.split("/")
    if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
        result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
    } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
        result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
    } else {
        result = JSON.parse(result)
        if (result.data && result.data.data) {
            result = {book_info: result.data.data}
        }
    }
}

let normalizedData = normalizeResponse(result);
JSON.stringify({data: normalizedData})
</js>

r=JSON.stringify(info.chapters);

searchUrl:
<js>
var variable = source.getVariable();
if (!variable || variable === "") {
    var defaultConfig = JSON.stringify({
        source: "èšåˆ",
        tag: "å°è¯´",
        mode: "default",
        forceListen: false,
        voice: "default"
    });
    source.setVariable(defaultConfig);
    variable = defaultConfig;
}
var config = {};
try {
    config = JSON.parse(variable);
} catch(e) {
    // è§£æå¤±è´¥åˆ™ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤å€¼
    config = {
        source: "èšåˆ",
        tag: "å°è¯´",
        forceListen: false
    };
}
function fetchSourceTags() {
    try {
        var key = getSecretKey();
        var url = getHost() + "sources?key=" + key;
        var response = java.ajax(url);
        var data = JSON.parse(response);
        
        if (data.c === 200) {
            var sources = data.data.sources;
            var sourceTags = {};
            var allTags = new Set();
            var sourceIds = ["èšåˆ"]; 
            for (var i = 0; i < sources.length; i++) {
                var src = sources[i];
                var tags = ["å°è¯´"]; 
                
                if (src.supported_types && src.supported_types.length > 0) {
                    tags = src.supported_types;
                }
                for (var j = 0; j < tags.length; j++) {
                    allTags.add(tags[j]);
                }
                
                sourceTags[src.id] = tags;
                sourceIds.push(src.id); 
            }
            sourceTags["èšåˆ"] = Array.from(allTags);
            
            return {
                success: true,
                sourceTags: sourceTags,
                sourceIds: sourceIds,
                allTags: Array.from(allTags)
            };
        }
    } catch(e) {
        java.log("ä»äº‘ç«¯è·å–æºæ¨¡å¼å¤±è´¥: " + e);
    }
    
    return {
        success: false,
        sourceTags: {},
        sourceIds: ["èšåˆ"],
        allTags: ["å°è¯´"]
    };
}
function processKey(inputKey) {
    var tagResult = fetchSourceTags();
    var sourceIds = tagResult.sourceIds;
    var modes = tagResult.allTags;
    var pattern = /@([^@]+)/g;  
    var cleanKey = inputKey;
    var foundSource = null;
    var foundMode = null;
    
    var match;
    while ((match = pattern.exec(inputKey)) !== null) {
        var tagValue = match[1].trim();
        if (tagValue.includes(",")) {
            var parts = tagValue.split(",");
            if (parts.length >= 2) {
                var sourcePart = parts[0].trim();
                var modePart = parts[1].trim();                              
                if (sourceIds.includes(sourcePart)) {
                    foundSource = sourcePart;
                }                                
                if (modes.includes(modePart)) {
                    foundMode = modePart;
                }
            }
        } 
     
        else if (sourceIds.includes(tagValue)) {
            foundSource = tagValue;
        }
       
        else if (modes.includes(tagValue)) {
            foundMode = tagValue;
        }
        cleanKey = cleanKey.replace(match[0], '');
    }
    
    
    cleanKey = cleanKey.trim();
    
    return {
        text: cleanKey,
        source: foundSource || config.source, 
        type: foundMode || config.tag 
    };
}
var result = processKey(key);
var key = result.text;
var ts = result.type; 
var selectedSource = result.source; 
var SecretKey = getSecretKey();
var Host = getHost();
java.log("å¤„ç†åçš„å…³é”®è¯: " + key);
java.log("ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ¨¡å¼: " + ts);
java.log("ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ¥æº: " + selectedSource);
java.put("ts",ts)
var url = Host + "search?query=" + encodeURIComponent(key) + 
          "&key=" + SecretKey + 
          "&ts=" + encodeURIComponent(ts) + 
          "&source=" + encodeURIComponent(selectedSource)+"&page="+page;
url;</js>
